title: Razorfin Abolisher

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (Blue) each night.
- (Blue)(1): Choose a player. If their Attack or Defense levels have changed in any way, they will become unable to talk, vote, or use actions in the following day phase.
- (1): Attack a player each night.

desc:
Post 1898
*Once you have been marked by the merrow, you are not long for their waters.*
